name: @signalk/signalk-schema
description: SignalK specification schema as an npm module with tests

scripts.prepublish: npm run js:dist && npm run docs:keys
scripts.schema:publish: git checkout gh-pages && git checkout master -- schemas && cross-var mkdir $npm_package_version && cross-var git add  $npm_package_version  && cross-var git mv schemas/ $npm_package_version/ && git commit -m "Schemas from master" && git push
scripts.docs:prep: gitbook install gitbook-docs && cross-var replace-in-file /_version_/g $npm_package_version ./gitbook-docs/* --isRegex --verbose && mdprepare gitbook-docs/*.md
scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:prep && npm run docs:changelog && npm run docs:keys && npm run docs:html && npm run docs:pdf && npm run docs:mobi && npm run docs:epub
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:all && cross-var git add $npm_package_version && git stash && git checkout gh-pages && git pull && cross-var git checkout stash -- $npm_package_version && git add master && cross-var git commit --allow-empty -m $npm_package_version && git push git@github.com:signalk/specification gh-pages

author: SignalK group
